cascadess 0.1.0
  • Reference

cascadess

A standalone package for yonder’s design functions.

Apply Bootstrap 5 utility classes and their styles to any htmltools tag element.

library(htmltools)
library(cascadess)

div(
  .style %>%
    margin(2) %>%
    background("light") %>%
    border("dark") %>%
    shadow("medium"),
  p("Fusce sagittis, libero non molestie mollis, magna",
    "orci ultrices dolor, at vulputate neque nulla lacinia eros.")
)
